content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Update FormatterConfig in response_formatter.rs to add large_response_config field
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating FormatterConfig
Add with_large_response_config() method to ResponseFormatterBuilder
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding builder method
Modify ResponseFormatter::format_success() to check for large responses
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after modifying format_success
Update ResponseFormatterFactory methods to include default LargeResponseConfig
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating factory methods
Run cargo clippy after completing ResponseFormatter changes
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Create new Response struct with success() and error() methods in response_formatter.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating Response struct
Add Response::build() method that returns a new ResponseBuilder
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding build method
Update ResponseBuilder to use ResponseFormatter internally
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating ResponseBuilder
Run cargo clippy after completing Response API changes
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Remove handle_brp_large_response call from handler.rs process_success_response
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing large response call
Update imports in handler.rs to remove handle_brp_large_response
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating imports
Migrate simple local handlers (get_trace_log_path, set_tracing_level, cleanup_logs)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating simple handlers
Migrate complex local handlers (list_logs, list_bevy_apps, brp_status)
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after migrating complex handlers
Run cargo clippy after completing all handler migrations
Fix any clippy issues following our rules
Remove handle_brp_large_response function from large_response.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after cleanup
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a subagent to do code review focusing on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review subagent's suggested changes with the user
